templates.template:
<xen:set var="$tresColumnSpacingHuge">40px</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$tresColumnSpacingLarge">30px</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$tresColumnSpacingMedium">20px</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$tresColumnSpacingSmall">10px</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$tresColumnSpacingEdge">5px</xen:set>

<xen:set var="$tresColumnFontSize">13px</xen:set>

.bdImage_3column .margin-r-edge { margin-right: {$tresColumnSpacingEdge}; }
.bdImage_3column .margin-b-small { margin-bottom: {$tresColumnSpacingSmall}; }
.bdImage_3column .margin-tb-small { margin-top: {$tresColumnSpacingSmall}; margin-bottom: {$tresColumnSpacingSmall}; }

.bdImage_3column { font-size: {$tresColumnFontSize}; }
.bdImage_3column .tres-column-ad { min-height: 1px; text-align: center; }

.bdImage_3column .tres-column-image a,
.bdImage_3column .tres-column-image img {
	background-position: center center;
	background-size: cover;
	display: block;
	width: 100%;
}

.bdImage_3column .tres-column-controls {
	display: block;
}
	{xen:helper clearfix, '.bdImage_3column .tres-column-controls'}
	.bdImage_3column .tres-column-controls .control {
		display: none;
		float: left;
		overflow: hidden;
		width: 25%;
	}
	.bdImage_3column .tres-column-controls .views { display: block; }
	.bdImage_3column .tres-column-controls .replies { display: block; }

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media screen and (min-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}) {
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .margin-lr-neg-edge-on-narrow { margin-left: -{$tresColumnSpacingEdge}; margin-right: -{$tresColumnSpacingEdge}; }
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .margin-lr-edge-on-narrow { margin-left: {$tresColumnSpacingEdge}; margin-right: {$tresColumnSpacingEdge}; }
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .margin-b-large-on-narrow { margin-bottom: {$tresColumnSpacingLarge}; }

	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .container { display: block; }
	{xen:helper clearfix, '.Responsive .bdImage_3column .container'}
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .column {
		display: block;
		float: left;
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		width: 50%;
	}
		.Responsive .bdImage_3column .column-3 { display: none; }
	
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .tres-column-title { line-height: 1.3em; max-height: 2.6em; overflow: hidden; }
}

@media screen and (min-width: {xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}) {
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .margin-lr-neg-small-on-wide { margin-left: -{$tresColumnSpacingSmall}; margin-right: -{$tresColumnSpacingSmall}; }
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .margin-lr-small-on-wide { margin-left: {$tresColumnSpacingSmall}; margin-right: {$tresColumnSpacingSmall}; }
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .margin-b-huge-on-wide { margin-bottom: {$tresColumnSpacingHuge}; }
	
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .column { width: 33.33%; }
	.Responsive .bdImage_3column .column-3 { display: block; }
}
</xen:if>
html { background: none; }

<xen:set var="$gridWidth">{xen:calc '({$widget.options.thumbnail_width} + {$widget.options.gap}) * {$widget.options.grid_columns}'}</xen:set>
<xen:set var="$maxWidthInSidebar">{xen:calc '{xen:property sidebar.width} - {xen:property secondaryContent.padding-left} - {xen:property secondaryContent.padding-right}'}</xen:set>
<xen:container var="$head.{$cssClass}">
<style>
.{$cssClass}
{
	width: {$gridWidth}px;
}
	.{$cssClass} li
	{
		margin-right: {$widget.options.gap}px;
	}

	.{$cssClass} img
	{
		width: {$widget.options.thumbnail_width}px;
		height: {$widget.options.thumbnail_height}px;
	}

<xen:if is="{$widget.options.thumbnail_width} > {$maxWidthInSidebar}">
	.sidebar .{$cssClass}
	{
		width: {xen:calc '({$maxWidthInSidebar} + {$widget.options.gap}) * {$widget.options.grid_columns}'}px;
	}
	
	.sidebar .{$cssClass} img
	{
		width: {$maxWidthInSidebar}px;
		height: {xen:calc 'floor({$maxWidthInSidebar} / {$widget.options.thumbnail_width} * {$widget.options.thumbnail_height})'}px;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property enableResponsive}">
@media (max-width:{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth})
{
	.non-sidebar-widget .{$cssClass}
	{
		width: 100%;
	}
		.non-sidebar-widget .{$cssClass} li
		{
			margin-right: 0;
			width: {xen:calc '100 / {$widget.options.grid_columns}'}%;
		}
		.non-sidebar-widget .{$cssClass} img
		{
			width: 100%;
			height: auto;
		}

}
</xen:if>

</style>
</xen:container>

<xen:set var="$heroImageThreadInfoFontSize">80%</xen:set>

.bdImage_heroImage .margin-r-edge { margin-right: {$heroImageSpacingEdge}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-r-small { margin-right: {$heroImageSpacingSmall}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-r-medium { margin-right: {$heroImageSpacingMedium}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-tb-edge { margin-top: {$heroImageSpacingEdge}; margin-bottom: {$heroImageSpacingEdge}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-tb-huge { margin-top: {$heroImageSpacingHuge}; margin-bottom: {$heroImageSpacingHuge}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-b-edge { margin-bottom: {$heroImageSpacingEdge}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-b-small { margin-bottom: {$heroImageSpacingSmall}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-b-medium { margin-bottom: {$heroImageSpacingMedium}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .margin-b-large { margin-bottom: {$heroImageSpacingLarge}; }
.bdImage_heroImage .padding-l-small { padding-left: {$heroImageSpacingSmall}; }

.bdImage_heroImage { font-size: {$heroImageFontSize}; }
.bdImage_heroImage a { background: none; border: 0; color: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-weight: inherit; }
.bdImage_heroImage a.block { color: inherit; display: block; margin: 0; padding: 0; text-decoration: none; }
.bdImage_heroImage a.block:hover,
.bdImage_heroImage a.block:focus,
.bdImage_heroImage a.block:active { background: none; box-shadow: none; text-decoration: none; top: 0; }

.bdImage_heroImage > .container {
	max-height: 90vh; <xen:comment>http://caniuse.com/#feat=viewport-units</xen:comment>
	overflow: hidden;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
}

.bdImage_heroImage .gradient {
	position: absolute;
		top: -{$heroImageSpacingHuge};
		right: -5px;
		bottom: -5px;
		left: -5px;

	<xen:comment>http://colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/</xen:comment>
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, {$heroImageGradientColor} 100%); /* FF3.6-15 */
	background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, {$heroImageGradientColor} 100%); /* Chrome10-25,Safari5.1-6 */
	background: linear-gradient(to bottom,  rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, {$heroImageGradientColor} 100%); /* W3C, IE10+, FF16+, Chrome26+, Opera12+, Safari7+ */
	filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#00000000', endColorstr='{$heroImageGradientColor}',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-9 */
}

.bdImage_heroImage img.hero {
	background-position: center center;
	background-size: cover;
	display: block;
	height: 0;
	padding-bottom: 85%;
	width: 100%;
}

.bdImage_heroImage .text {
	bottom: 0;
	position: absolute;
	width: 100%;
}
	.bdImage_heroImage .text-inner {
		position: relative;
	}

.bdImage_heroImage .thread-title {
	color: {$heroImageThreadTitleColor};
	font-size: {$heroImageThreadTitleFontSize};
	font-weight: 700;
}

.bdImage_heroImage .post-body {
	display: none;
}
	.bdImage_heroImage .messageText {
		color: {$heroImageMessageTextColor};
		font-family: inherit;
		font-size: {$heroImageMessageTextFontSize};
		line-height: 1.3em;
		max-height: 3.9em;
		overflow: hidden;
	}

.bdImage_heroImage .thread-info {
	color: {$heroImageThreadInfoColor};
	display: none;
	font-size: {$heroImageThreadInfoFontSize};
	height: {$heroImagePosterImgSize};
	line-height: {$heroImagePosterImgSize};
	padding-left: {xen:calc 'intval({$heroImagePosterImgSize}) + intval({$heroImageSpacingMedium})'}px;
	position: relative;
}
	.bdImage_heroImage .poster-avatar {
		line-height: 0;
		left: 0;
		position: absolute;
	}
	.bdImage_heroImage .poster-avatar img {
		background: none;
		border: 0;
		border-radius: {$heroImagePosterImgSize};
		height: {$heroImagePosterImgSize};
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0;
		width: {$heroImagePosterImgSize};
	}
	.bdImage_heroImage .poster {
		color: {$heroImagePosterColor};
		font-size: {$heroImagePosterFontSize};
		font-weight: 400;
	}
	.bdImage_heroImage .post-date { display: none; }
	.bdImage_heroImage .forum a {
		color: {$heroImageForumColor};
		font-weight: 400;
	}

.bdImage_heroImage .spacing-edge {
	display: block;
	height: {$heroImageSpacingEdge};
	width: 100%;
}

.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image,
.wf-container-simple #content.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image {
	background: {$heroImageGradientColor} !important;
	color: {$threadViewColor};
}
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .bdImage_heroImage { font-size: {$threadViewFontSize}; }
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .first-post .text,
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .replies .text,
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .quickReplyContainer .text,
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image __reset {
		bottom: initial;
		position: initial;
	}
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .replies .text,
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .quickReplyContainer .text {
		font-size: {$threadViewRepliesFontSize};
	}
	.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .text-inner.pageWidth {
		margin: 0;
		padding: 0 {$heroImageSpacingMedium};
		width: 100%;
	}

.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageList .message,
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageList .messageInfo,
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageList .messageUserBlock,
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image __reset { background: none !important; border: 0 !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; }
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageList .messageContent { min-height: 0; }
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageList a.muted { display: block; }
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageList a.control { color: {$threadViewControlColor}; }

.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageList .message { padding: {$heroImageSpacingSmall} 0 !important; }
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageUserInfo { float: none; margin-bottom: {$heroImageSpacingMedium}; width: 100%; }
.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageUserBlock { background: none; border: 0; }
{xen:helper clearfix, '.bdimage_thread_view_hero_image .messageUserBlock'}
